fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Taxation, Transport
head_office_address: 6 Pullman Court Chichester House Great Western Road
inter_groups:
EFCO&HPA is a member of the Network of European Private Entrepreneurs in the Tourism Sector (NET) and have involvement in the below group through this.  The Intergroup is called:  
"Development of European Tourism, Cultural Heritage, Ways of Saint James’ and other European Cultural Routes"
eu_initiatives: Initiatives related to the tourism sector such as policies, proposals and legislation.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission Expert Group on the Implementation of the Bathing Water Directive (2006/7/EC)#E02936#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2936#Observer#C
membership: Network of European Private Entrepreneurs in the Tourism Sector (NET)
goals__remit: EFCO&HPA is the representative body of the camping and caravanning industry at the European level, including caravans, tents, motorhomes, chalets and all forms of self-catering accommodation in the park setting.  Membership is made up of the national trade associations of 23 European countries.
legal_status: EFCO&HPA is the representative body of the camping and caravanning industry at the European level, including caravans, tents, motorhomes, chalets and all forms of self-catering accommodation in the park setting.
